about.firstText: We are a laboratory of innovation and development that transcends physical boundaries to build free digital spaces.
about.secondText: Our greatest desire is to deliver Web 3.0 to the world, i.e. a fair decentralized internet in which users control their own data, identity and destiny.

team.text: It’s our team's commitment that allows us to push technology boundaries and create digital products that cut through the noise.
team.contact: contact us to join the team

form.formTitle: THIS COULD BE YOU, JOIN THE TEAM
form.contactTitle: Tell us more about your project and explore all the possibilities to bring it to the next level!

banner.about: Imagine the possibilities. We realize them.

portfolio.title: proud of

service.firstDescription: We help you explore Web3 technologies and implement innovative solutions related to digital assets, Blockchain, NFTs, AI, and the metaverse.
service.secondDescription: We leverage on latest generation frameworks and programming languages to provide performing digital products.
service.thirdDescription: We create unique experiences that connect people and brands in meaningful ways
service.blockchain_description: Smart Contracts / Blockchain Protocols / NFTs & Tokenization / DApps / Notarization / DeFi / MEGO Tickets
service.metaverse_description: dApp Integration / API Integration / NFT Marketplace Integration
service.marketplace_description: Nft & web2 marketplace / Crypto & fiat payment
service.website_description: landing page development / website development / web3 integration
service.app_description: web app / gameplay / development / app store release
service.branding_description: Corporate brand identity (logo design and guideline book) / Visual Identity and applications / Brand image consulting
service.design_description: Landing / Websites / Marketplaces /apps interface design on Figma

mego.sub-title: A crosschain ticketing system that allows to create event, manage and sell tickets. Often the web3 Apps are not so user friendly. This occurs from both admin and user side. But MEGO it’s simple, easy and fun!
